SET(REMODL_TARGET tau_remodl)
SET(REMODL_SOURCES remodl.c)

SET(SETBRN_TARGET tau_setbrn)
SET(SETBRN_SOURCES setbrn.c)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/..)

SC_ADD_EXECUTABLE(REMODL ${REMODL_TARGET})
SC_LINK_LIBRARIES(${REMODL_TARGET} tau_internal m)

SC_ADD_EXECUTABLE(SETBRN ${SETBRN_TARGET})
SC_LINK_LIBRARIES(${SETBRN_TARGET} tau_internal m)
